subcommands.name: relate
subcommands.description: aggregate `extract`ed information and calculate relatedness among samples.

options.description: optional path to expected groups of samples (e.g. tumor normal pairs). A group file is specified as comma-separated groups per line e.g.:
optional sample prefixes that can be removed to find identical samples. e.g. batch1-sampleA batch2-sampleA
optional path to a ped/fam file indicating the expected relationships among samples.
only genotype sites with at least this depth. (default: 7)
hets sites must be between min-ab and 1 - min_ab. set this to 0.2 for RNA-Seq data (default: 0.3)
set unknown genotypes to hom-ref. it is often preferable to use this with VCF samples that were not jointly called
infer relationships (https://github.com/brentp/somalier/wiki/pedigree-inference)
output prefix for results. (default: somalier)

subcommands.name: ancestry

options.description: file with ancestry labels
prefix for output files (default: somalier-ancestry)
number of principal components to use in the reduced dataset (default: 5)

batch size fo training neural network (default: 32)

subcommands.name: find-sites
subcommands.description: create a new sites.vcf.gz file from a population VCF (this is rarely needed).

options.description: optional exclude files
optional include file. only consider variants that fall in ranges within this file
sites in slivar gnotation (zip) format to exclude
minimum distance between autosomal SNPs to avoid linkage (default: 10000)
minimum number of alleles (AN) at the site. (must be less than twice number of samples in the cohort) (default: 115_000)
minimum allele frequency for a site (default: 0.15)
